title: Time from Swirl: A Hydrodynamic Origin of Proper Time
description:
Swirl--String Theory (SST) models matter as knotted swirl strings embedded in an incompressible, inviscid swirl condensate of effective density \(,=)\) and a local swirl energy density
        \[
